#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main(){

    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        string s1,s2;
        cin>>s1>>s2;
        long long a[28]={0},i,x=0;
        for(i=0;i<s2.length();i++){
            a[s2[i]-'a']++;
        }
        for(i=0;i<26;i++)if(a[i]>0)x=x^a[i];
        if(x!=0){
            if(s1=="Tarun")cout<<"Tarun";
            else cout<<"Varun";
        }
        else {
            if(s1=="Tarun")cout<<"Varun";
            else cout<<"Tarun";
        }
        cout<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;





}
